data.text: @sarahvtobiason I think it will be years before we have the real numbers. If those are close, US deaths have been higher this time. Hard to imagine what the numbers would have been had we done nothing, given that unlike flu, Covid spreads before you know you have it.

@seregil42 The only one changing the subject (or thread) in ANY of these threads is you! 

Anyone that can read can see that 😂

@seregil42 Yes, I know. You claimed you made a point on one thread that was on a different one. I gave you plenty of opportunities, you chose to play dumb. I already responded, not my fault you decided to switch threads for no reason when you have no point to make. It’s still there. Enjoy.
@sarahvtobiason You sure like to change the subject, don't you?  I guess when you think it's your only way out....

@seregil42 I literally SAID I posted it after you, by seconds! You had HOURS! 

Just say you don’t know how to navigate Twitter! Embarrassing for how bold you’re being but at least it’s honest 😂 https://t.co/65ANe13Xqe
@seregil42 Not only did I respond, I responded 3 hours ago. Like I said man, keep up. 😂
@sarahvtobiason Haha, after I post it, nice. Yeah, no shit you responded to it.  That's when the goalposts post came in.  Keep up, sweetheart.
